dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2245 IH: To prohibit the Ambassador’s Fund for Cultural Preservation from making grants, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Lankford introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit the Ambassador’s Fund for Cultural Preservation from making grants, and for other purposes.

section.text: No funds made available to the Department of State or any department or agency may be used to carry out the Ambassador’s Fund for Cultural Preservation or any other such program to provide grants for cultural preservation outside the United States.
